subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brandon Saad, Johnny Oduya and Marian Hossa scored in the third period for the Blackhawks, who opened their Stanley Cup title defense with a 6-4 victory over the Washington Capitals.
snippet: Brandon Saad, Johnny Oduya and Marian Hossa scored in the third period for the Blackhawks, who opened their Stanley Cup title defense with a 6-4 victory over the Washington Capitals.
